channel.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++

item.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:5, topic:373848”]Ok, both of them are wrong.

Steps:

Firstly go to ActionHandler.java
declare this:

case 494: c.getDH().sendDialogues(500,npcType); break;

Then go to DialougeHandler.java

and put something like this in:

case 500: sendNpcChat1("Welcome to the bank", c.talkingNpc, "Banker"); c.nextChat = 501; break; [/quote]Yup thats right, i did forget in ActionHandler.java and change this case 1552: c.getDH().sendDialogues(500, 1552); break;
to this

case 495: c.getDH().sendDialogues(500, 495); break;
Thanks Rep++

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Ok, both of them are wrong.

Steps:

Firstly go to ActionHandler.java
declare this:

case 494: c.getDH().sendDialogues(500,npcType); break;

Then go to DialougeHandler.java

and put something like this in:

case 500: sendNpcChat1("Welcome to the bank", c.talkingNpc, "Banker"); c.nextChat = 501; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:2, topic:373848”]It’s all in the ‘case 500:’.

The 500 is Santa’s ID, so find the banker’s ID and change that 500 to it.

Look up switch statements and figure out how they work.[/quote]Well actually 1552 is Santa’s ID, So i doubt that will work :s.

X Entinity X:

[quote] case 494: sendNpcChat4(“TEXT1”, “TEXT2”, “TEXT3”, “TEXT4”, c.talkingNpc, “Banker”); c.nextChat = 495; break;

??[/quote]That didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

It’s all in the ‘case 500:’.

The 500 is Santa’s ID, so find the banker’s ID and change that 500 to it.

Look up switch statements and figure out how they work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quick question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Hey, how would i convert this case 500: sendNpcChat4("TEXT1", "TEXT2", "TEXT3", "TEXT4", c.talkingNpc, "Banker"); c.nextChat = 501; break; into a banker talking, because atm its Santa
